data.Name: Los Fugitivos
data.Bio: There are multiple bands with the name Los Fugitivos: 1) A late '60s garage rock band from Mexico. They released an LP entitled En La Esquina. 2) With their keyboard-driven Cumbias and airy pop sound, Los Fugitivos dominated the onda grupera scene of the '90s. Brothers Jaime and Edi Espinoza formed the band in 1985 as Grupo Kariño. But in 1991, with the addition singer/keyboardist Roberto Nieto, the band became Los Fugitivos. The band's first hits were covers Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Guardianes Del Amor
data.Bio: Guardianes del Amor is a mexican group that consists of 5 members; Arturo Rodriguez, Oscar Saúl Cervantes, Daniel Poplawsky, Pablo Calderón, and Ernesto Gracia. Guardianes Del Amor have become very popular in Mexico as well as the U.S. They have released numerous albums over the past 10 years. Read more on Last.fm
